articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit 3870
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit 3870
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army of the DPRK, inspected KPA Unit 3870 honored with the title of the O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment.
					 He waved back to the enthusiastically cheering service personnel before having a photo session with them.
					
					 He learned about the unit's performance of duty and training.
					
					 Praising the unit for having prepared all its service personnel as a-match-for-a hundred combatants through the intensified training in hearty response to the Party's slogan "Training Is Also a Battle!" he highly appreciated their militant spirit of training, the spirit of thinking of preparations for combat only awake or asleep. 
					
					 He set forth the tasks to be carried out to bolster the combat capability of the unit.
					
					 He looked round the soldiers' hall, mess hall and various other places to take deep care of their living.
					
					 He dropped in at a library and stressed the need to send more must books to the soldiers. Once they finish their service in the army, they  should be let to acquire the same ample knowledge as college or university graduates', he noted, underscoring the need to prepare all service personnel as Songun revolutionary fighters equipped with the spirit of devotedly defending the socialist homeland. 
					
					 He praised the unit for splendidly building the soldiers' hall and constructing its facade well.
					
					 He personally tasted bean paste produced by the unit itself and learned about the use of the agro-stock farm and the general processing center built by it and its other supply service facilities. He repeatedly praised its commanding officers for doing a lot of work by fully displaying the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.
					
					 Walking the compound of the barracks, he said the service personnel of the unit successfully spruced up the barracks and areas around it as required by the Songun era and as befitting the creators of the revolutionary soldier culture in the Songun era.
					
					 This unit set an example not only in combat and political training but in all aspects including command and management of the unit and its supply service, he noted, adding all the service personnel glorifying their precious youth after turning out to defend the country are excellent revolutionaries and precious treasures of the country.
					
					 Noting that such traits of revolutionary comradeship whereby commanding officers love their soldiers like their real younger brothers while the latter follow the former like their eldest brothers and sisters and help and lead each other along are in fuller bloom, he said that this is the proud tradition and traits of the heroic KPA, the army of the party and the revolution.   
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Generals Kim Myong Guk and Kim Won Hong and KPA Lieut. General Ri Tu Song.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Air Force Unit 354
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Air Force Unit 354
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and state and army of the DPRK, inspected KPA Air Force Unit 354 honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment before guiding a flight training.
					 After receiving a salute, Kim Jong Un warmly waved back to the enthusiastically cheering service personnel before having a photo taken with them.
					
					 After acquainting himself with the unit's combat duty, he guided the flight training of pilots. 
					
					 After watching the courageous training which demonstrated the might of the air force, he praised the pilots for their good performance. He was greatly satisfied with a very high level of control of warplanes such as taking off and landing and bold and skilful movement. He was very pleased that all the pilots have been prepared as able pilots of fighters. 
					
					 He repeatedly praised the pilots for their success in performing training duties before taking a photo taken with them. 
					
					 He looked round a flight hall, bedroom of pilots, mess hall, soldiers' hall and other places of the unit to take warm care of the training and living of the pilots.
					
					 After watching pilots undergo training on the table with deep attention, he expressed satisfaction over the fact that they are using their brains, thinking and putting everything into practice so that they may win any battle by skillfully using Korean-style fighting methods and tactics in keeping with the trend of the changed warfare mode and combat action regulations of the enemies and the trend of the development of arms and equipment. 
					
					 After being informed that the pilots are flying to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution awake or asleep, singing the song that the sun is over the wings of their planes and Pyongyang is beneath them, he said that Hero Kil Yong Jo left a very good song. He told all pilots to cherish his soul.
					
					 While watching sketches done by soldiers, he said that their skills are as good as the professional painters' and the army has many talents and reserve painters.
					
					 At the pilots' bedroom visited by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un sat on a bed without any ceremony and kindly asked if they did not feel any inconvenience on their beds. 
					
					 At the mess hall, he underscored the need to provide good diet to the pilots as their mental and physical burden is heavy, saying that for them there is nothing to spare. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un who visited the unit, carrying with him a freshwater fish, weighing more than 60 kg, presented by people, showed such loving care for pilots as teaching how to cook it for them to taste it. 
					
					 He looked round a company under the unit to take deep care of the servicemen's life. 
					
					 He was pleased with the warm bedroom. At an educational room he listened to the song sung by the company leader and political instructor by using DVD and sent applause to them. 
					
					 He called at a wash-cum-bath house and learned about where water was coming from and personally took its temperature.
					
					 Before leaving the company, he asked the company leader and political instructor to take good care of the soldiers' living like their eldest brothers and sisters and revolutionary comrades-in-arms, adding he would like to leave the soldiers to them.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the service personnel of the unit would further step up their combat preparations and thus devotedly safeguard the blue sky of the socialist country with their lives. 
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Generals Kim Myong Guk and Kim Won Hong and KPA Lieut. General Ri Tu Song.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime Accused of Disturbing Peace and Security in Northeast Asia
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime Accused of Disturbing Peace and Security in Northeast Asia
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Disarmament and Peace Institute of the DPRK Foreign Ministry Friday released a report accusing the Lee Myung Bak regime of seriously disturbing the peace and security in Northeast Asia. 
					 The report said:
					
					 During 4 years of office the Lee Myung Bak regime has put the north-south relations at the lowest ebb, placing peace and security in Northeast Asia at serious peril and throwing a stumbling block in the process of denuclearization.
					
					 It was none other than the Lee regime that plays the role of an advance party to ignite a fuse for starting a war in the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak, obsessed with the pipedream of "achieving unification through absorption", talked about "unification tax," inciting confrontation. Finally, he pushed the situation on the peninsula to a touch-and-go one where the north and the south fired shells at each other for the first time since the war that broke out on June 25, 1950. 
					
					 The hundreds of thousands of south Korean troops deployed in areas south of the Military Demarcation Line have already been put into a de facto state of war as they are ready to "mount a preemptive attack and strike enemies' bases" in case of emergency.
					
					 The report cited detailed facts that the Lee regime is a disturber of peace and security in Northeast Asia. 
					
					 Northeast Asia is the most sensitive area where the military powers and nuclear weapons states of the world are located close to each other or stand in military confrontation. 
					
					 The south Korean navy's warship "Cheonan" sank in south Korea in March, 2010. 
					
					 The Lee regime, however, blamed the DPRK for its sinking as if it had been waiting for it to happen. 
					
					 The U.S. deployed a carrier flotilla deep in the West Sea of Korea under the pretext of fulfilling its commitment to protecting south Korea as if an opportunity had presented itself for it, thus making an important strategic breakthrough for militarily containing China. 
					
					 The Lee regime doggedly refused to accept the DPRK's request for receiving an inspection group of its National Defence Commission for fair probe into the truth behind the sinking case.
					
					 It was against this backdrop that the U.S. reinforced its military forces forward-deployed in Northeast Asia under the signboard of taking countermeasures and staging joint military drills to be capable of seizing and containing its rivals and satisfactorily undertaking mobile strike duty in a matter of a few months. 
					
					 This led to dangerous military confrontation between China and the U.S. and more acute military conflict between Russia and the U.S. over the issue of building a missile shield.
					
					 At a time when Japan was busy launching spy satellites, the existence of the undeclared plutonium was discovered to give rise to serious concern of the international community.
					
					 The number of U.S.-south Korea joint military maneuvers and drills sharply increased and a triangular military alliance consisting of the U.S., south Korea and Japan took a clear shape, arousing distrust of neighboring countries.
					
					 It is the unanimous judgment of many military experts at home and abroad that the construction of a large naval base on Jeju Island farthest from the Military Demarcation Line is not targeted against the DPRK but aimed at meeting the strategic purpose of the U.S. to put under control the operational theatres of the naval and air forces of China and Russia.
					
					 The Lee regime is a war servant who plays the role as a guide and a springboard for the U.S. keen to return to Asia so as to realize its dream of dominating the world at any cost.
					
					 The report brought to light the true colors of the Lee regime as a disturber of the process for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is the desire of not only the Korean people but the neighboring countries and the peace-loving people of the world to denuclearize the peninsula as well as the rest of the world.
					
					 The DPRK and other participating countries are making efforts to resume the six-party talks. But it is only the south Korean authorities that are pursuing a very ulterior aim. 
					
					 The Lee regime has resorted to all sorts of tricks and plots to politicize even the issue of the U.S. humanitarian food aid to the DPRK in a bid to bar confidence from being built between the DPRK and the U.S. for a solution to the nuclear issue. 
					
					 For instance, the chief executive of Chongwadae presumptuously claimed a few days ago that "it was not the U.S. but the north that changed its negotiating stance," though he was unaware of how the discussion was made on the food aid between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the six-party talks are an uncomfortable forum for the Lee regime as it is contrary to its "policy towards the north".
					
					 The resumption of the talks would naturally help promote the implementation of the September 19 Joint Statement that calls for the normalization of relations among all participating countries for a solution to the nuclear issue and provision of aid to the DPRK including economic compensation. This would amount to such developments that may frustrate the moves of the hostile forces which begged their masters to follow "waiting strategy" and "policy of strategic patience," hoping the DPRK would waver or yield to economic difficulties. 
					
					 In case the opportunity for resuming the talks is completely missed, its blame will go to the Lee regime which played sleight of hand on the basis of a wrong policy and judgment.
					
					 The anti-DPRK confrontation maniacs in south Korea have already been sidelined or have become politically dead amid world people's criticism as they were insensitive to the times and lacked vision as was the case with the Neo cons in the U.S., and the Lee regime will also be compelled to quit eventually, the report said, and continued:
					
					 All the parties concerned in the region interested in peace, stability and denuclearization are called upon to take proactive steps to minimize the consequences caused by the Lee regime.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Croatian PM
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Croatian PM 
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim sent a congratulatory message to Zoran Milanovic on his appointment as prime minister of Croatia on Wednesday. 
					 In the message Choe Yong Rim wished him success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country. 
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to Vesna Pusic on her appointment as foreign minister of Croatia on the same day.

articles.title: Opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai" Staged
articles.content:
Opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai" Staged 
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A homecoming performance of opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai" given by artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe of the DPRK took place at the Ponghwa Art Theatre on Friday.
					 Some days ago the troupe returned home from China.
					
					 The opera based on the famous Chinese folklore is another flower of the DPRK-China friendship, provided under the care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The opera had been performed 30 odd times in 12 cities of China, including Beijing, Daqing, Shanghai, Guangzhou and Qingdao from Oct. 25 last year to Jan. 7 this year, causing a hot wind of Korean opera in vast Chinese territory.
					
					 Chinese media and Internet homepages vied with each other to report about performances of this opera, featuring the wisdom of Kim Jong Il who initiated its creation and guided the work to perfect it and stirring up the heated atmosphere of praising the great man.
					
					 In particular the world public was deeply moved at the touching fact that the Workers' Party of Korea allowed the opera performance to continue even after Kim Jong Il passed away, a great loss to the Korean nation, and at the ideological and moral traits of the Korean artistes who successfully ensured its performances to the last by turning their sorrow into strength and courage, true to his behests.
					
					 The performances registered another significant chapter in the annals of the DPRK-China friendship. They were a vivid manifestation of the solidness of this friendship further deepened by Kim Jong Il through his energetic activities.
					
					 Enjoying the homecoming performance were Kim Yong Nam,  Kim Ki Nam and other senior party and state officials, officials of the Foreign Ministry and the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, creators and artistes, journalists and editors.
					
					 Also present on invitation were Ambassador Liu Hongcai and staff members of the Chinese embassy here and Chinese guests.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience as it strikingly displayed the inexhaustible potentials of the Juche arts advancing on the world level while achieving its remarkable development by the unique Korean way of creation.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Marked
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Jan. 20 to mark the 60th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "On Making Good Preparations for Universal, Free Medical Care". 
					 The work, published on Jan. 20, 1952, clarifies that the universal free medical care is the most popular policy enforced at state expense and clearly explains its significance and indicates the tasks and ways for making preparations for it.
					
					 The President made sure that the universal, free medical system was enforced in all areas of the DPRK from Jan. 1, 1953 and took measures to introduce the complete and universal, free medical system.
					
					 He saw to it that the Public Health Law of the DPRK was promulgated in April 1980, providing a legal guarantee for fully granting to the people rights to medical treatment and the promotion of their health and consolidating the socialist public health system.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to ensure that the Korean people would benefit from the above-said system, thus making sure that the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital was built and dental and children's hospitals and other specialized ones were constructed in all provinces and cities to raise the level of specialization of healthcare.
					
					 The people throughout the country are now provided with all medical services and medicines free of charge by the state and their health and the right to medical treatment are fully guaranteed by the Socialist Constitution and the Public Health Law. 
					
					 Hospitals and clinics are found not only in the urban and rural areas but in fishermen's and forestry workers' villages and the people are provided with all conditions for healthcare without any inconveniences including the section doctor system. 
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, made a report.
					
					 He noted that the past 60 year-long history in which the universal, free medical care has been enforced is the glorious course in which the most popular policies have been enforced, defended and developed thanks to the wise leadership and warm benevolence of the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He underlined the need to effect a turn in the health work as required by the era of a great surge and thus fully glorify the advantages of the socialist health system of the DPRK.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work "On Juche Literature" Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work "On Juche Literature" Marked
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place here on Thursday to mark the 20th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Juche Literature".
					 The work published on Jan. 20, 1992 clarifies the main principle of the literature construction which calls for fully embodying realism of Juche, the issues of comprehensively carrying forward the tradition of the revolutionary literature and considering the socio-political organism, an integral whole of the leader, party, army and people, as an eternal source of depiction in literature, the principle for depiction which calls for creating literature centered on the characteristics on the basis of truth and philosophy with seed as the core and other issues.
					
					 The work also deals with leadership method of taking the party's leadership as a lifeline of the Juche literature construction, pushing ahead with the popularization of literature and successfully training writers as revolutionaries who share destiny with the party. 
					
					 The work expounds the theory that a work portraying the leader should be a model of the Juche literature and makes an original clarification of the issue of making it a peculiar artistic physiology. This provided a framework of the Juche literature firmly based on the revolutionary outlook on the leader. 
					
					 Over the last two decades the Korean writers have achieved successes in creating works encouraging the service personnel and people of the DPRK in the worthwhile march for a great surge to open the gate to a thriving nation and making a contribution to the development of literature and arts in the Songun era by embodying the Workers' Party of Korea's Juche-oriented theory of literature. 
					
					 The participants in the meeting paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il in humble reverence. 
					
					 Sin Yong Son, chairman of the Central Committee of the Writers Union of Korea, in his report said that the work serves as an immortal grand programme as it paved a wide avenue for developing the Juche-oriented humanics in the era of independence. It, at the same time, serves as a great banner for fully demonstrating the true nature of the theory of socialist literature, its truth and greatness and steering the present and future of human literature, he added.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Moves under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Moves under Fire
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea committed heinous crimes against the fellow countrymen in the north, when they were stricken with grief over the demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The regime scattered leaflets slandering the leadership of the DPRK, trying to incite disturbance in the north.
					
					 A workshop head of the East Pyongyang Thermal Power Station, U Myong Gap, told KCNA:
					
					 "The Lee regime's crimes are intolerable for all ages. It is ridiculous for Lee to cry for 'window of opportunity' and 'removal of mutual distrust' in the beginning of the new year and pay a lip-service to the improvement of north-south relations and dialogue even in a foreign country.
					
					 Furthermore, his group of traitors heaped abuses on the mourners over their wailing the leader's demise.
					
					 The workers of the power station are determined to inflict a stern punishment on them."
					
					 Kim Sun Ae, a student of Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, said:
					
					 "The Lee Myung Bak regime is a group of political hooligans.
					
					 Even foreigners shared the sorrow with the Korean people in memory of leader Kim Jong Il and sent messages to express deep condolences over his passing away.
					
					 But, only the group of traitors, who are ignorant of elementary morality and antagonistic to the fellow countrymen in the north, maliciously slandered its supreme leadership.
					
					 By clamoring about dialogue nowadays, they seek to appease the angry people in the north and mislead public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 The group of traitors deserves a harsh punishment."

articles.title: Art Performances Inspire Korean People with Confidence
articles.content:
rt Performances Inspire Korean People with Confidence
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- From the beginning of the new year art performances have taken place in the DPRK, adding to the people's yearning for General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The New Year concert "The Cause of the Sun Will Be Immortal", given by the Unhasu Orchestra, is going on in Hamhung City after the capital city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Its colorful numbers represent the great feats Kim Jong Il performed for the fatherland and people in his lifetime.
					
					 A music and dance performance "Let Us Uphold Our Supreme Commander Forever" leaves deep impressions on the audience.
					
					 The performance, given by military artistes, tells that the feats Kim Jong Il performed for the development of the revolutionary armed forces will shine forever as they are guided by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Moranbong and Wangjaesan art troupes and the National Symphony Orchestra have also given performances, encouraging the people to unfailingly build a thriving socialist nation by converting the sorrow for the demise of the leader into strength and courage. 
					
					 The National Theatrical Troupe restarted performing the light comedy "Echo of Mountain", a masterpiece recreated in the Songun (military-first) era.
					
					 Other national and local art troupes, including the Phibada Opera Troupe and the Jagang Provincial Art Troupe, have conducted artistic activities in industrial establishments and co-op farms.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Maintaining National Independence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Maintaining National Independence
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The issue of reunification of Korea is an internal issue of the Korean nation and an issue of establishing sovereignty throughout Korea. Therefore, it can never be a plaything of outside forces for aggression under any circumstances. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article. 
					
					 If the issue of national reunification is to be solved according to the will and wishes of the Korean nation, it is necessary to view and approach everything from an independent stand and resolutely reject interference by outside forces, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 It is important to give priority to the nation. The destiny of an individual depends on the fate of the nation. Adhering to the stand of national independence alone can ensure the dignity and sovereignty of all members of the nation. 
					
					 It is the bounden duty and obligation of all members of the nation to attach importance to the nation and place the common interests of the nation above anything else in the present era when it is advancing under the banner of June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 The master key to improving the inter-Korean relations and bringing a rosy future of national reunification and prosperity lies in firmly maintaining the stand of national independence and placing the nation above anything else as required by the north-south declarations. 
					
					 The struggle to uphold and implement the declarations is accompanied by a struggle to meet all the anti-reunification challenges. 
					
					 All Koreans at home and abroad should resolutely maintain the above-said stands called for by the joint New Year editorial and thus brilliantly decorate this year as a year of victory for bringing about a landmark phase of national reunification.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun, a leading newspaper of the DPRK, Friday dedicated an article to the 20th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Juche Literature".
					 The work raises it as the fundamental problem decisive of the destiny of the Juche-based literature and art to defend and carry forward the tradition of revolutionary literature and art and clarifies the principled matters arising in assessing and developing the national literary and art heritage.
					
					 It also gives profound exposition of the important matters arising in further developing the Korean literature under socialist construction going on at the high stage and ways to do so.
					
					 For its originality and truth in content, orderly and perfect composition, versatility in sectors, concrete analysis, scientific depth and popularity in description and gemlike propositions, the work "On Juche Literature" serves as the great guideline for building unique and scientific literature, which is beyond comparison with any other works on literary and art theories in the world, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The past two decades since the publication of the work were a period of surge in literary and art creation during which masterpieces stirring the era had been produced in a large number.
					
					  Among them are revolutionary and militant songs that can never be exchanged with a colossal amount of food and revolutionary, optimistic and emotional poems consistent with the idea that ordeal and trial is temporary and rosy future is sure to come. They had served as the march of struggle and companion of life for the Korean army and people.
					
					 When the DPRK was going through stern trials, its creators composed such songs as declaring that arduous march is sure to be followed by happiness. They loudly eulogized the victory and miracles wrought under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In the emotion-charged Songun era the literature of the DPRK successfully represented many heroes of the era who have displayed their indomitable mental power with the conviction and faith in socialism and future, and thus recorded in history what the Songun era is.

articles.title: Papers Call on Officials to Faithfully Serve People
articles.content:
Papers Call on Officials to Faithfully Serve People
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK newspapers on Friday run editorials calling on all officials to make redoubled efforts to achieve greater results in the drive for the sake of the people as befitting the officials and party members trained by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the Workers' Party of Korea expects the officials, leading members of the revolution, to acquire President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's style outlook on people and more thoroughly establish it than ever before at a time when the whole country is dashing ahead to win victory this year. It continues:
					
					 The popular masses are almighty beings in the world and the Korean people can only be called "great people"--This was Kim Jong Il's noble outlook on people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's outlook on people has been carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un and he is pursuing the same benevolent politics, all-embracing politics as Kim Jong Il's. 
					
					 The WPK's outlook on people is a clear viewpoint of attaching importance to people as it regards them as true comrades, excellent teachers and the most talented creators and a stance of loving and devoting oneself to people as it calls for firmly protecting their dignity and interests and faithfully working for their happiness.
					
					 The officials in the DPRK are sons and servants of the people before being leading members of the revolution.
					
					 It is the intention of the WPK to see the party and people and officials and popular masses tide over stern trials arms in arms and shoulder to shoulder and consolidate the single-minded unity, a noble revolutionary legacy of Kim Jong Il.  
					
					 An official should shoulder upon himself a task and undergo sufferings, while letting people enjoy honor and happiness. He should bear the brunt in the spirit of exploring a snow-covered path, considering the people's pain as his own. This is a genuine revolutionary comrade of the WPK. 
					
					 Officials should go deeper among people as conditions get difficult and hard and lead them along as their mother would do, sharing breath and weal and woe with them. Herein lies the master key to arousing all the masses to a fresh general onward movement. 
					
					  Minju Joson also calls on all the officials to dedicate themselves to the drive for the sake of the people and glorify 2012 as a year of proud victory when en era of prosperity is unfolding under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Replacement of Senior Media Persons Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Replacement of Senior Media Persons Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Journalist Association of south Korea issued a statement on Jan. 16 calling for replacing those senior media persons responsible for false reports.
					  MBC reporters demanded the resignation of the chief of the news report headquarters and the director of the news report bureau and others, the statement noted, adding: 
					
					 Last year alone, MBC did not cover actions of people from all walks of life against FTA with the U.S. and downplayed irregularities and corruption disclosed among ruling quarters during the April 27 by-election, October 26 Seoul Mayoral election and the case of Naegok-Dong housing site purchase, etc.
					
					 The statement noted that the recent drastic drop of the number of MBC audience and credibility indicates that the people have turned their backs on the broadcasting service which has lost its impartiality.
					
					 The statement chided the MBC management for putting pressure on those reporters urging the replacement of those who hold responsible for them and threatening to take disciplinary actions against them. 
					
					 Those who force reporters to release misinformation should be replaced to preserve fair media service, the statement said, warning they would launch strong protest unless the reporters' demands are met.

articles.title: South Korean Authorities Accused of Yielding to U.S
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Yielding to U.S.
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- South Korean civic and social organizations including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Confederation of Trade Unions and the Solidarity for Progress on Jan. 17 held a press conference in front of the puppet Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade to condemn the authorities for yielding to the U.S.
					 The organizations criticized the U.S. for trying to plug south Korea into imposing sanctions against Iran.
					
					 Recalling that to this end an official of the U.S. Department of State has been on visit to south Korea since Jan. 16, they lodged a strong protest with it.
					
					 In case the authorities meet the U.S. request, it will cause serious consequences to south Korea, they warned.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Lee Myung Bak regime is yielding to the U.S. under the pretext of the alliance with it, they deplored, and continued:
					
					 The alliance with the U.S. which the "government" has so noisily advertised is, in the final analysis, aimed at helping the U.S. maintain its supremacy. 
					
					 They declared all people would dynamically turn out in the action against the humiliating alliance with the U.S.

articles.title: Reduction of University Registration Fee Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Reduction of University Registration Fee Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The general student councils of five universities in south Korea, including Korea University and Yonsei University, called a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 17, demanding reduction of the registration fee for new school term.
					 Speakers at the conference charged that the authorities take no notice of the fact that university students and their parents are suffering from the skyrocketing registration fee.
					
					 To reduce the fee is the demand of the times, they said, adding that the universities should turn out in the struggle to have the fee reduced.

articles.title: Personality of Kim Jong Un as Great Man Lauded by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Personality of Kim Jong Un as Great Man Lauded by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Media of different countries widely introduced the personality of the dear respected Kim Jong Un as a great man on Jan. 8 and 9.
					 The Turkish newspapers Hurriyet Daily News and Today's Zaman carried photos of the respected supreme commander inspecting units of the Korean People's Army. They said:
					
					 The Korean central TV broadcast a documentary film showing General Secretary Kim Jong Un inspecting an army unit.
					
					 This shows the firm will of Kim Jong Un to inherit the Songun politics of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 An Egyptian TV aired scenes showing Kim Jong Un guiding the joint exercises of the three services of the KPA. It said: His inspection of KPA units and others give the same impressions as those of Kim Jong Il in his lifetime. Drawing attention is the future activities of Kim Jong Un to boost the military capability.
					
					 TV broadcasting services of Hungary showed revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Un such as his presence in the WPK conference and standing on the tribune of honor of Kim Il Sung Square, etc., noting that the service personnel and people of the DPRK absolutely trust and follow him.
					
					 MTI News Agency of this country released the same news.
					
					 The Russian internet News Ru, the Thai newspaper Bangkok Post, AP and the New York Times, BBC, Jiji Press, the Asahi Shimbun and Mainichi Shimbun of Japan and Austria Presse-Agentur, APA and ORFTV of Austria introduced the personality of Kim Jong Un as a great man under the titles "New Leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un", "Inborn Disposition of New Leader" and others.

articles.title: DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Supported in Peru
articles.content:
DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Supported in Peru
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, released a statement on Jan. 13 in support of the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK.
					 Last year was a year of victory, featured by radical changes and leap forward effected in the building of a prosperous and powerful nation in the DPRK under the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il, he said, and continued:
					
					 Socialist Korea of Juche has entered a new period of prosperity, true to the cause of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people will achieve brilliant successes in their drive for opening the gate to a thriving nation this year marking the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: World Public Praises Kim Jong Un as Great Man Born of Heaven
articles.content:
World Public Praises Kim Jong Un as Great Man Born of Heaven
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- World public is praising the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is identical to the great men of Mt. Paektu in idea, leadership and traits.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in an article posted on their Internet homepage said that General Kim Jong Un is possessed of all dispositions as a state leader and strategist.
					
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un is a gifted Songun brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu type, the organizations added.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea praised Kim Jong Un as a man who most perfectly personified the temperament and traits as a modern statesman and strategist on the highest level. He has wisely led the KPA for years while making journeys of Songun together with General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the chairman said.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Blits in its article posted on its Internet homepage said that Kim Jong Un is fully possessed of Kim Jong Il's love for the people, adding that he is a tender-hearted father of the Korean people and the sun of the destiny whom they will follow to the end of this world.
					
					 The Indonesian paper Suara Karya stressed that Kim Jong Un is recognized as the youngest leader not only in Korea but in the the world.
					
					 The editorial board of the Russian paper Patriot Office in a statement said: Kim Jong Un set it as its mission to faithfully inherit and brilliantly accomplish the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. He was always near Kim Jong Il on the forefront of the cause for the revolution and socialist construction.
					
					 The chairman of the C.C., Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, the rector of the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin and the secretary general of the Ministry of Culture and Heritage of Guinea said that the future of Songun Korea is immensely rosy as it has Kim Jong Un as the supreme leader.

articles.title: Russia to Bolster National Defence Capabilities
articles.content:
Russia to Bolster National Defence Capabilities
 Moscow, January 19 (KCNA) -- This year Russia is planning to take several measures for increasing the national defence capabilities.
					 As part of them, surface-to-air missile complex "S-400" of new generation in commission at the Baltic Sea Fleet is to go on combat duty in Kaliningrad Region in April.
					
					 The commander of the fleet said that the building of positions for the complex is now under way, noting that the complex will be deployed in the center of Kaliningrad Region, situated in the country's western end, to protect it from attacks in all directions.
					
					 Meanwhile, tests of trial new-type armed equipment of about 70 kinds for the strategic rocket forces, the air defence forces and missile and artillery units of the ground forces will be made at the Kapustin Yar firing range in Astrakhan Region this year.

articles.title: Russian FM Urges Japan Not to Distort History
articles.content:
Russian FM Urges Japan Not to Distort History
 Moscow, January 19 (KCNA) -- Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov referred to the issue of the southern Kuriles in a press conference on Jan. 18.
					 Noting that four islands of the southern Kuriles became part of the Russian territory as a result of World War II, he said that there is no doubt about Russia's sovereignty over the islands.
					
					 It is needless to create complexity or give priority to feelings over this matter, he said urging Japan to refrain from issuing statement contrary to etiquette and not to distort history unilaterally.

articles.title: Iran Says U.S. Unable to Stop Iran from Shutting Strait of Hormuz: Commander
articles.content:
Iran Says U.S. Unable to Stop Iran from Shutting Strait of Hormuz: Commander
 Tehran, January 19 (KCNA) -- Deputy Chairman of Joint Chiefs of Staff of Iran's Armed Forces Massoud Jazayeri said Monday the United States cannot hinder Iran's efforts to shut down the strategic Strait of Hormuz if Tehran deems it necessary.
					 The principal objective of Iran in the region is to defuse tensions, Jazayeri said, adding that however, should the country's national interests come under threat, Iran's armed forces will utilize their defensive capabilities to defend the country's sovereignty.

articles.title: West Scenarios against Iran Propaganda Show: Larijani
articles.content:
West Scenarios against Iran, Propaganda Show: Larijani
 Tehran, January 19 (KCNA) -- Western countries' scenarios, including sanctions on Iran's oil, military threats and assassinations are propaganda show against Iran's regional inspiring role and scientific progresses, Iranian Parliament Speaker Ali Larijani said Monday.
					 He made the remarks in an interview with the Iranian Arabic language news channel the Al-Alam.
					
					 "Iran is ready for any scenario including sanctions on its oil and it will use its own ways to confront the threats," he said.

articles.title: India Defiant to U.S. Sanctions about Purchasing Oil from Iran
articles.content:
India Defiant to U.S. Sanctions about Purchasing Oil from Iran
 New Delhi, January 19 (KCNA) -- Indian Foreign Secretary Ranjan Mathai said his country will continue to buy oil from Iran in spite of U.S. sanctions.
					 Mathai told reporters here on Tuesday afternoon that India will not follow U.S. sanctions against Iran.
					
					 "We have accepted UN imposed sanctions, but not sanctions imposed by a sole country," said Mathai.

articles.title: UAE, Iraq Oppose Military Attack on Iran
articles.content:
UAE, Iraq Oppose Military Attack on Iran
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Foreign ministers of the United Arab Emirates and Iraq in a recent joint press conference clarified the stand against any military attack on Iran.
					 They stressed that the two countries are opposed to the use of force against Iran and call for defusing the regional tension through dialogue.
					
					 If the Strait of Hormuz is blockaded, all the countries exporting oil through Persian Gulf will be damaged, they said.

articles.title: Non-Aligned Movement Condemns Presence of U.S. Drone in Iran
articles.content:
Non-Aligned Movement Condemns Presence of U.S. Drone in Iran
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Non-Aligned Movement (NAM) released a statement Tuesday condemning the most recent incident of a U.S. drone in Iranian air space.
					 An unmanned U.S. spy plane, known as a drone, crashed in Iran on Dec. 4, 2011. The NAM statement said that the drone activity "contravenes all universally accepted existing international norms relating to sovereignty and inviolability of air space of sovereign countries."
					
					 The statement added that the drone action by the U.S. also contradicts the founding principles of the NAM.

articles.title: Summit of Economic Community of Central African States Held
articles.content:
Summit of Economic Community of Central African States Held
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The 15th summit of the Economic Community of Central African States, was held in N'Djamena, the Chadian capital, on Jan. 15 and 16.
					 Present there were heads of state and governments and representatives of member nations of the community.
					
					 Discussed at the summit were the issues of strengthening economic and financial cooperation among member nations to realize the regional integration and ensuring the security of the regional countries.
					
					 At the end of it, a final communique was adopted.

articles.title: Mexican President Encourages More Foreign Trade
articles.content:
Mexican President Encourages More Foreign Trade
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Mexican President Felipe Calderon in a speech at an event on Monday stressed the importance to develop foreign trade.
					 He said that his government recognizes the importance of foreign trade as a powerful engine of the national economy. To boost foreign trade is an important issue in providing inhabitants with jobs, he noted.
					
					 The government will take steps to modernize ports and customs for the development of foreign trade, he added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona Unidad 354 de fuerzas aereas del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona Unidad 354 de fuerzas aereas del EPC
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Estado y el ejercito, dirigio un entrenamiento de vuelo durante su inspeccion sobre la Unidad 354 de las fuerzas aereas del EPC que recibio el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					Tras recibir el parte de recepcion, respondio con su mano a las aclamaciones de los militares y se retrato con ellos.
					
					Se cercioro de las misiones de combate asumidas por la unidad y dirigio un entrenamiento de vuelo.
					
					Terminado el intrepido entrenamiento que demostro el poderio de la aviacion del EPC, dijo que los aviadores tienen un alto nivel de pilotaje, en particular, el de despegue y aterrizaje, y manejan los aeroplanos con sensible valentia y habilidad.
					
					Se puso muy contento de que todos los pilotos se hayan preparado como competentes combatientes del cielo.
					
					Volvio a evaluar los exitos alcanzados en la ocasion por los aviadores que cumplieron con exito la mision asignada y tomo una foto de recuerdo con ellos.
					
					Acto seguido, Kim Jong Un recorrio varios lugares como el salon del ejercicio de navegacion, el dormitorio, el comedor, la casa de militares, etc., prestando profunda atencion al entrenamiento y vida cotidiana de los aviadores.
					
					Tras presenciar atentamente el entrenamiento a la mesa de los aviadores, expuso su satisfaccion de que ellos concentraran sus pensamientos y acciones en ganar el combate usando los metodos y tacticas al estilo coreano frente a los cambiados modos de guerra y accion en combate de los enemigos y a la tendencia de desarrollo de armamentos.
					
					Informado de que los aviadores navegan la ruta de defensa de la Direccion de la Revolucion cantando la "Cancion del aviador", escrita por el piloto heroe Kil Yong Jo enfatizando en una estrofa que sobre el ala de su avion esta el Sol y por debajo de ella esta Pyongyang, dijo que Kil habia dejado esa cancion muy buena e instruyo a todos los pilotos encarnar el espiritu del heroe fallecido en sus corazones. 
					
					Viendo los bosquejos creados por los militares, subrayo que los pintores son tan talentosos como los especialistas y anadio que el EPC cuenta con muchos hombres de gran talento y mucha reserva de los creadores de bellas artes.
					
					En el dormitorio visitado por el Dirigente             Kim Jong Il, el Comandante Supremo se sento en la cama de los pilotos y les pregunto carinosamente que incomodidad tiene la cama.
					
					En el comedor senalo que por la gran carga espiritual y fisica, los navegadores deben nutrirse bien y Apunto que para ellos no hay nada de escatimar.
					
					El entrego mas de 60 kg de Aristichthys nabilis traido por si mismo, que el pueblo dirigio al Comandante Supremo y enseno el metodo de cocinarlo para que los pilotos probaran.
					
					Luego, el Comandante Supremo recorrio una compania adscrita directamente a la unidad y presto gran atencion a la vida de los uniformados.
					
					Se mostro satisfecho de que el dormitorio estuera caliente y en la sala de educacion, dio aplauso al jefe e instructor politico de la compania que cantaron juntos a traves del DVD-Karaoke.
					
					Estuvo en el bano donde hizo conocimiento de la fuente del agua y verifico la temperatura del agua.
					
					Despidiendose de la compania, encomendo al jefe y el instructor politico de esta subunidad que siendo hermanos y hermanas mayores y amigos de armas revolucionarios de los integrantes de la compania, deben prestar atencion a la vida de ellos.
					
					Expreso esperanza y conviccion de que al dar acicate al preparativo de combate, los militares de la unidad defenderan a riesgo de la vida el cielo azul de la patria socialista.
					
					Le acompanaron los generales de ejercito del EPC Kim Myong Guk y Kim Won Hong y el teniente general del EPC, Ri Tu Song.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona Unidad 3870 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona Unidad 3870 del EPC
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- El Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Estado y el Ejercito, Kim Jong Un, inspecciono la Unidad 3870 del EPC ganadora del titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					El Comandante Supremo saludo a los militares que le aclamaban con calurosa hospitalidad y tomo una foto de recuerdo junto con ellos.
					
					Seguidamente, se entero del estado de cumplimiento de la mision y ejercicios de la unidad.
					
					Alabo a la unidad que  bajo la consigna "!El entrenamiento es  precisamente el combate!", forma a los militares como combatientes capaces de la pelea uno vs. cien enemigos mediante la intensificacion de ejercicios, y aprecio altamente el combativo modo de entrenamiento de ellos que piensan siempre en la preparacion de combate.
					
					El Comandante Supremo presento las tareas para incrementar la combatividad de la unidad.
					
					Recorrio la casa de militares, el comedor y otros lugares prestando atencion a las condiciones de vida de los uniformados.
					
					En la biblioteca resalto la necesidad de enviar mas libros de lectura obligatoria para que al terminar el servicio militar, los uniformados posean ricos conocimientos como se hubieran graduado de una universidad.
					
					Dio enfasis en formar a los uniformados como combatientes revolucionarios del Songun que posean la disposicion de defender la patria socialista.
					
					Evaluo que la unidad ha acondicionado bien la casa de militares y adornado excelentemente sus paredes.
					
					Probo el sabor de la pasta de soya  hecha en la unidad y averiguo el estado de operacion de la granja  agropecuaria, el centro de elaboracion integral y otros establecimientos de intendencia.
					
					Volvio a evaluar altamente el hecho de que los comandantes de la unidad hicieron realmente muchos trabajos usando su espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza.
					
					Al dar una vuelta por el recinto del cuartel, enseno que los militares han acondicionado magnificamente el cuartel y sus alrededores como creadores de la cultura revolucionaria de los militares de la epoca de Songun.
					
					Esta unidad es ejemplar en todos los aspectos como el entrenamiento militar-politico, la administracion de la unidad y la intendencia, apunto.
					
					Son magnificos revolucionarios y tesoros de la patria todos los militares que pasan su preciosa juventud con el fusil en la mano para defender la patria, destaco.
					
					Dijo que en el ejercito se fomenta cada dia mas la camaraderia revolucionaria, segun la cual los comandantes aman a los soldados como a sus hermanos menores, y los segundos siguen a los primeros como a sus hermanos mayores ayudando mutuamente, y enfatizo que esto es una tradicion y cualidad orgullosas del heroico EPC, ejercito del Partido y la revolucion.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion los generales de ejercito del EPC, Kim Myong Guk y Kim Won Hong, y el teniente general del EPC, Ri Tu Song.

articles.title: Instituto de MINREX revela crimenes del "poder" de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Instituto de MINREX revela crimenes del "poder" de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- El Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 19 un informe de estudio que revela los crimenes del "poder" de Lee Myung Bak que ha perturbado gravemente la paz y la seguridad de la region del Nordeste Asiatico.
					Durante 4 anos de su mandato, el "poder" de Lee llevo las relaciones intercoreanas a la peor coyuntura, puso en serio peligro la paz y la seguridad del Nordeste Asiatico y genero grandes obstaculos para el proceso de desnuclearizacion, comienza el texto y continua:
					
					El "poder" de Lee sirve de mecha de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Enloquecido por su ambicion de la "reunificacion a modo de absorcion", Lee se dedico a la campana conflictiva con el Norte (de Corea) planteando hasta el "impuesto de reunificacion" y empeoro la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a tal punto que el Norte y el Sur intercambiaron los obuses de artilleria por primera vez despues de la guerra coreana del 25 de junio de 1950.
					
					Ahora, cientos de miles de efectivos surcoreanos desplegados en la parte sur de la linea de demarcacion militar estan pasando practicamente al estado de guerra como el de "ataque preventivo, el de punto de origen".
					
					El "poder" de Lee es el perturbador de la paz y la seguridad de la region del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Esta region es la mas delicada donde las potencias militares y los paises poseedores de armas nucleares del mundo estan colindados o se enfrentan militarmente.
					
					En marzo de 2010, ocurrio en el Sur de Corea el hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan".
					
					Como si hubiera esperado ese caso, el "poder" de Lee lo relaciono injustamente con la RPDC.
					
					Aprovechandolo, EE.UU. dio una importante coyuntura estrategica capaz de impedir en lo militar China a su favor al mandar su flotilla de portaaviones al Mar Oeste de Corea en funcion de su compromiso a la defensa del Sur de Corea.
					
					Mientras que el "poder" de Lee rechazaba hasta el final la demanda del grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC sobre el esclarecimiento imparcial de lo ocurrido realmente en ese incidente, EE.UU. termino en unos meses bajo el cartel de "contramedidas" y ejercicios militares conjuntos la preparacion de sus fuerzas militares distribuidas en las zonas avanzadas del Nordeste Asiatico para cumplir las misiones de cercar, disuadir y atacar con movilidad a sus rivales. 
					
					Como resultado, se crea entre China y EE.UU. el peligroso estado de confrontacion militar y se agudizan las contradicciones militares entre Rusia y EE.UU. en torno al establecimiento del sistema antimisiles. Mientras tanto, en Japon toma auge el lanzamiento de satelites artificiales de espionaje y se descubrio una reserva de plutonio no declarada, lo cual causa seria preocupacion del mundo. 
					
					Se realizan con mas frecuencia los ejercicios miliares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea y esta tomando el perfil la alianza militar tripartita que incluye ademas a Japon. Este hecho esta centrando la mirada de desconfianza de los paises vecinos.
					
					Por otra parte, muchos expertos militares nacionales y extranjeros reconocen unanimemente que la construccion de una base naval de gran dimension en la isla Jeju, muy lejana de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar, no es una medida frente a la RPDC sino la que conviene a la estrategia de EE.UU. de restringir el teatro operacional de las fuerzas navales y aereas de China y Rusia.
					
					En fin de cuentas, el "poder" de Lee es el lacayo de guerra que actua como guia y puente de EE.UU. que persigue el "retorno a Asia" para realizar su antano sueno de tomar la heguemonia mundial.
					
					El "poder" de Lee es el que estropea la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La desnuclearizacion de esta region es un eslabon de la del mundo entero y constituye la aspiracion unanime del pueblo coreano y sus vecinos y la humanidad pacifista del mundo.
					
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas son las unicas que no se suman a los esfuerzos de los demas participantes en las conversaciones a 6 bandas, inclusive la RPDC, por reanudar esta cita.
					
					A decir la verdad, este dialogo es un espacio incomodo para el "poder" de Lee porque no conviene a su "politica sobre el Norte". Si se reanuda la cita, se impulsara de modo automatico la implementacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre que preve normalizar las relaciones entre todos los paises participantes y asegurar a la RPDC la recompensacion economica y otras cooperaciones para solucionar el problema nuclear. 
					
					Tal evolucion de la situacion puede frustrar el designio de las autoridades surcoreanas que suplicaron a sus amos mantener la "estrategia de espera" y la politica de "paciencia estrategica", deseando que la RPDC se desplome o se rinda por sus dificultades economicas.
					
					Si se pierde para siempre la oportunidad de reanudar las conversaciones a 6 bandas, la responsabilidad recaera sobre el "poder" de Lee que se dedica a las artimanas por sus intereses faltos de vision y egoistas.
					
					Como sucedio en el caso de neoconservadores de EE.UU., los elementos de confrontacion anti-RPDC surcoreanos, insensibles a la corriente de la epoca y cortos de vision, tuvieron que retirarse ya en medio de condenacion de todo el mundo. Asi sera el destino del "poder" de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					Todos los paises de la region interesados en la paz, la estabilidad y la desnuclearizacion deberan tomar buenas medidas para minimizar las consecuencias de lo que ha cometido el "poder" de Lee.

articles.title: CRPP revela maligno intento de Lee Myung Bak sobre el dialogo
articles.content:
CRPP revela maligno intento de Lee Myung Bak sobre el dialogo
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- En relacion con que recientemente la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak habla del "dialogo" como si tuviera interes en el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) senalo el dia 19 a la ACNC como sigue:
					Desde el principio del ano nuevo, el traidor Lee hablo tanto de la "oportunidad" y la "eliminacion de desconfianza mutua" y en otro pais se refirio a los "esfuerzos comunes por el mantenimiento de la estabilidad y la paz" de la Peninsula Coreana como si tuviera interes en la mejora de las  relaciones y el dialogo Norte-Sur.
					
					En estos dias, el ministro titere de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea Ryu U Ik y otros tipejos dicen diariamente la "apertura de la ruta del dialogo" y peroran descaradamente que el "Sur espera la participacion del Norte en el dialogo" y "se esforzara por resolver las relaciones con el Norte".
					
					La banda traidora hizo sablazos en el corazon de los connacionales que derramaban las lagrimas de sangre por el inesperado fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il e incluso insulto las lagrimas de condolencias de los habitantes de la RPDC. Sin pedir disculpas sobre sus crimenes, habla del "dialogo", lo cual es una burla e insulto imperdonables al pueblo coreano indignado.
					
					Para colmo, la banda de Lee muestra mas su malsano intento conflictivo diciendo que "no hay cambio en la base de la politica sobre el Norte" y "desempenara el papel principal tomando firmemente la base de la politica sobre el Norte".
					
					Ademas, cuestionando el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" cuya naturaleza intrigante fue revelada a todo el mundo, habla absurdamente del "cambio" y la "opcion" de alguien.

articles.title: Acto por 20o aniversario de publicacion de obra de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Acto por 20o aniversario de publicacion de obra de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 19 en esta capital el acto por el 20o aniversario de la publicacion de la obra del Dirigente           Kim Jong Il "Literatura Jucheana" publicada el 20 de enero de 1992.
					Ese trabajo aclara claramente los principios fundamentales de la construccion literaria en materializar cabalmente el realismo del Juche, el tema de heredar y desarrollar generalmente las tradiciones de literatura revolucionaria, el de tomar el organismo socio-politico unido entre el lider, el partido, el ejercito y el pueblo, como la eterna fuente de la representacion, los principios de descripcion de crear de modo verdadero y filosofico la literatura del centro de caracter cuyo nucleo es la semilla.
					
					En la obra se establecio nuevamente el metodo de la direccion de la literatura para acelerar la creacion masiva de la literatura tomando la direccion del partido como la linea de vida de la construccion literaria del Juche y formar a los escritores como revolucionarios que comparten el destino con el partido.
					
					Al presentarse originalmente el asunto de que la obra de descripcion al lider debe ser modelo de la literatura del Juche y el de su innato caracter   artistico, se ha asentado la base de la literatura del Juche en que se ha establecido firmemente la concepcion revolucionaria del lider.
					
					Durante 20 anos pasados, los escritores coreanos lograron exitos en la creacion de las obras que estimulan a todo el ejercito y el pueblo a la marcha de gran auge por abrir las puertas del Estado prospero y contribuyen al desarrollo de la literatura y arte de la epoca del Songun.
					
					Los participantes en el acto guardaron un momento de silencio rindiendo sublime homenaje al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El presidente del Comite Central de la Union de Escritores de Corea Sin Yong Son, en su informe, senalo que la obra es el inmortal programa que abrio la amplia ruta para desarrollar la literatura del Juche de la epoca de la independencia y la gran bandera que manifiesta sin reserva el verdadero aspecto, la veracidad y la grandeza de la teoria literaria socialista y orienta la literatura humana de hoy y el porvenir.
